segments.text: Hi , I'm calling from Nika Corporation . We would like to hold a business lunch at the restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , certainly . I'm Linda , the Manager . I can help you with that . How many will there be in your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . For a party that size , we have a separate banquet room in the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there an extra charge to reserve the room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , as long as you can guarantee at least 15 guests , there is no extra charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I'd like to go ahead and reserve the room , then , for Friday , December 2 , at around noon . This is a retirement party and we'd like to bring a cake for the guest of honor and some bottles of champagne . Will that be acceptable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cake is no problem at all , but we do charge a corkage fee of $ 15 a bottle for any alcohol not purchased from the restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I have the banquet room reserved for a lunch on for Nika Corporation on the 2nd of December . May I have your name and contact information ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'm J McQuillin and my number is 323-555-6840 , extension 42 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Mr . McQuillin . I'll give you a call a week in advance to confirm the arrangements .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for choosing Bruno's . We look forward to seeing you on the 2nd .
segments.speaker: S1
